programme.title: The Millers
programme.desc: Nathan tries to get his parents back together by bringing out sentimental family possessions to remind them of good times they've had.

programme.title: The Millers
programme.desc: Carol gathers the family for a discussion when she learns that Tom never talked to Nathan about the birds and the bees.

programme.title: The Millers
programme.desc: After Nathan helps Carol set up a profile on an Internet dating site, he and Ray start corresponding with one of Carol's potential suitors.

programme.title: The Millers
programme.desc: When Nathan learns why Debbie is Tom's favorite child, he decides to expose some of Debbie's childhood secrets.

programme.title: The Millers
programme.sub-title: Carol's Parents Are Coming to Town
programme.desc: When Carol's overbearing parents visit for the holidays, Carol tries to cover up failed relationships; Nate considers getting back together with Janice (Eliza Coupe).

programme.title: The Millers
programme.desc: When Debbie thinks Carol and Nathan are reading her diary, she and Adam devise a fake entry in order to prove it.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Becky meets up with an old friend and feels pressured to impress him; Dan questions his position at the hardware store, which leads to a massive fight with Ben.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.sub-title: An Old Dog, New Tricks and a Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Becky is working double shifts and taking classes at the community college, resulting in less time with her daughter; Dan decides to foster an elderly dog.

programme.title: Man With a Plan
programme.desc: When Adam and Andi have an important talk with Teddy and Kate, their awkward approach makes the kids uncomfortable.

programme.title: Man With a Plan
programme.desc: When Andi forces Adam to hang out with Lowell, Don feels left out, and Andi has to make peace between them; Mrs. Rodriguez reveals to Andi that she had a sexy dream about Adam.

programme.title: Grounded for Life
programme.sub-title: I Saw Daddy Hitting Santa Claus
programme.desc: Playing Santa at the Christmas fair, Walt promises Henry an expensive toy, infuriating Sean and Claudia.

programme.title: Grounded for Life
programme.desc: Henry walks in on his parents having sex and tells his entire class about it; Sean tells his son about the birds and the bees.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF is relegated once again to the attic when the Tanners throw a Hawaiian luau.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF dreams that he's a famous stand-up comic. Cameo appearances by Casey Kasem and NBC President Brandon Tartikoff.

programme.desc: Joe Spaghetti; Nice Gnawing You; Old Habits Slide Hard.

programme.desc: Just Chute Me; That's Nacho Cheese; When Fishes Sneeze.

programme.desc: Big laughs in little packages.

programme.desc: Gags in uniform.

programme.desc: Dog sings along with girl; parrot dances on head of cat.

programme.desc: Dog eats watermelon from man's mouth; puppies run for food; parrot eats puree.

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: Visiting relatives cause problems for Jill, Tim and Al (Patricia Richardson, Tim Allen, Richard Karn).

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: Tim and Jill (Tim Allen, Patricia Richardson) must make a parenting decision when Mark (Taran Noah Smith) is accused of stealing a knife.

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: Jill (Patricia Richardson) plays matchmaker and introduces Wilson (Earl Hindman) to one of her professors (Beth Dixon).

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: The Taylor family stays at a resort for the wedding of Jill's (Patricia Richardson) cousin. With Tim Allen.

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: Tim (Tim Allen) must choose between his career and friendship when his new boss (guest star Charlie Robinson) wants to ax Al (Richard Karn).

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: Tim (Tim Allen) joins Jill's (Patricia Richardson) literary group when he feels threatened by her male classmate.

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: Jill's (Patricia Richardson) surprise 40th birthday party may be ruined by her search for a piano from her youth. With Tim Allen.

programme.title: Home Improvement
programme.desc: Jill (Patricia Richardson) unwittingly creates marital strife for the father (guest star Mark L. Taylor) of Randy's girlfriend (guest star Kimberly Cullum).

programme.title: Bob Hearts Abishola
programme.desc: Bob, a middle-aged compression sock businessman from Detroit, unexpectedly falls for his cardiac nurse while recovering from a heart attack and sets his sights on winning her over. Undaunted by Abishola's lack of initial interest or the vast differences in their backgrounds -- she's originally from Nigeria -- Bob is determined to win Abishola's heart in this comedic examination of immigrant life in America. From award-winning creator, executive producer and writer Chuck Lorre.

programme.desc: Arthur is reluctant to allow Franco to make the shop's bank deposit; James regrets confiding in Randy after she shares an embarrassing secret about him with other cops at the station.

programme.desc: When Randy writes an article for the school paper disclosing Binford Tools' poor environmental record, Tim feels flabbergasted.
